channel.title: Glucosyltransferase on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Glucosyltransferase on funPlantGenes

item.title: CsGT45
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CsGT45 Gene Name: flavonoid glucosyltransferase Genome: Species: Crocus sativus Functional Descriptions: Using degenerate primers designed to match the plant secondary product glucosyltransferase (PSPG) box we cloned a full length cDNA encoding CsGT45 from C.

item.title: CsRAX1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_6G014240 Gene Symbol: CsRAX1 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsRAXs negatively regulate leaf size and fruiting ability through auxin glycosylation in cucumber.

item.title: CsRAX2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_3G036040 Gene Symbol: CsRAX2 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 2 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsRAXs negatively regulate leaf size and fruiting ability through auxin glycosylation in cucumber.

item.title: CsRAX5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: CsaV3_UNG046320 Gene Symbol: CsRAX5 Gene Name: R2R3-MYB transcription factor 5 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: CsRAXs negatively regulate leaf size and fruiting ability through auxin glycosylation in cucumber.

item.title: cZOGT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: cZOGT1 Gene Name: cis-zeatin-O-glucosyltransferase Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat cis-zeatin-O-glucosyltransferase cZOGT1 interacts with the Ca2+-dependent lipid binding protein TaZIP to regulate senescence.

item.title: FaGT2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: FaGT2 Gene Name: UDP-glucose glucosyltransferase 2 Genome: Species: Fragaria ananassa Functional Descriptions: FaGT2: a multifunctional enzyme from strawberry (Fragaria × ananassa) fruits involved in the metabolism of natural and xenobiotic compounds.

item.title: TaZIP
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: TaZIP Gene Name: cZOGT1-interacting protein Genome: Species: Triticum aestivum Functional Descriptions: Wheat cis-zeatin-O-glucosyltransferase cZOGT1 interacts with the Ca2+-dependent lipid binding protein TaZIP to regulate senescence.

item.title: VvBBX44
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: VIT_200s0347g00030 Gene Symbol: VvBBX44 Gene Name: Vitis vinifera B-box protein 44 Genome: Species: Vitis vinifera Functional Descriptions: Our previous work has shown that Vitis vinifera B-box protein 44 (VvBBX44) inhibits anthocyanin synthesis and represses VvHY5 expression in grape calli.
